moveslikemafuyu.configuration.enable_sli: Enable sliding: Hold sneak key while sprinting to perform ground slide
moveslikemafuyu.configuration.enable_dap: Enable water skipping: Automatically leap forward when sliding onto water surface
moveslikemafuyu.configuration.enable_sli: Enable aerial duration reset: Refresh slide duration when airborne
Enable collision impact: Stop sliding and knockback entities upon collision
moveslikemafuyu.configuration.enable_cli: Enable wall scaling: Vault over 2-block high obstacles when jumping
Enable wall jump: Press jump + sneak during climbing for vertical boost
moveslikemafuyu.configuration.enable_fal: Enable fall recovery: Press sneak mid-air to recover from falls
moveslikemafuyu.configuration.enable_sha: Enable shallow swim: Press sprint in 1-block deep water to swim
moveslikemafuyu.configuration.enable_swi: Enable aquatic dash: Consume oxygen for burst propulsion while swimming
moveslikemafuyu.configuration.enable_fre: Enable surface breathing: Maintain swimming state while breathing at water surface
moveslikemafuyu.configuration.enable_swi: Enable dolphin leap: Press jump during free swim for aerial glide
moveslikemafuyu.configuration.enable_cra: Enable prone stance: Double-tap sneak to enter/exit crawling
Enable prone slide: Press sprint while crawling to slide
moveslikemafuyu.configuration.enable_lea: Enable diving lunge: Press sneak after sprint-jump to perform dive
moveslikemafuyu.configuration.enable_jum: Enable jump transition: Quick prone entry after jump triggers dive
